name: Similar-Company-Finder
description: Identifies companies similar to a given input company by profiling, mapping, and scoring based on product, customer, and brand traits.

appStages.name: Introduction
Similar-Company-Finder

      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv class\u003d\"introduction\"\u003e\n  \u003cdiv class\u003d\"header\"\u003e\n    \u003ch3\u003eSimilar Company Finder\u003c/h3\u003e\n    \u003c/div\u003e\n  \u003csection\u003e\n    \u003cul\u003e\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003eEnter the necessary fields below to find companies with similar profiles.\u003c/li\u003e\n    \u003c/ul\u003e\u003c/section\u003e\n\u003c/div\u003e",
      "refreshOnChange": false,

      "type": "htmlelement",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },

      "label": "Columns",
      "columns": [
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Company Name",
              "placeholder": "eg: Google",
              "description": "Name of company for which similar companies have to be found",

              "tableView": true,
              "validate": {
                "required": true
              },
              "key": "company_name",
